channel.title: Relictus oldschool 525 style
channel.description:
[center][img]http://relictus.net/images/logo_small.png[/img]
Relictus is an oldschool Runescape private server (rsps). Relictus offers you a friendly community, flawless and unique content, active PvP and most of all a cozy server.
[size=18pt]Links[/size]
[url=http://relictus.net]Relictus | Website[/url] [url=http://relictus.net/client.jar]Relictus | Downloadable client[/url] [url=http://relictus.net/client.php]Relictus | Webclient[/url]
[size=36pt]Features[/size]
[size=18pt]PvM[/size]
[b]Bosses[/b] - Dagganoth kings - Chaos elemental - Corperal beast - Godwars dungeon - Kalphite queen - King black dragon - Tormented demons - Giant mole - Troll general
[b]Dungeons[/b] - Brimhaven dungeon - Edgeville dungeon - Relekka slayer dungeon - Taverley dungeon - Slayer tower
[b]Other[/b] - Rock crabs - Green dragons - Mithril dragons
[size=18pt]PvP[/size]
- Perfect switching - Pvp area at home - All potions with correct delay - Serveral other PvP areas
[size=18pt]Skilling[/size]
- All 21 skills that belong to a 525 style server are working. - You can train almost every skill at home, take a look at the media. - Many different slayer tasks (easy, medium hard and boss tasks) with rewards. - Good xp rate, not too slow and not too fast. - This server will certainly provide you a great skilling experience.
[size=18]Minigames[/size]
- Flawless barrows - Castle wars - Duel arena - Ranging guild - Thzaar cave
[size=18pt]MISC[/size]
- Easter ring gambling - Clue scrolls with normal and rare rewards - Random events - Weekly events hosted by mods - 4 different quests - Achievements with achievement points shop - Clan chat - Credits shop and awesome donator features - Some customs added not too much
[size=18pt]Website[/size] - Highscores - Vote for reward (Choose between 1 hour double xp or vote points) - Monster database - Forum - Top 3 player kills on homepage
[size=36pt]Media[/size]
[IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/2l905km.png[/img]
[img]http://relictus.net/images/advertisement/Relictus_home_map.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/1z2hhk3.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/14m9xm9.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/16bn2n9.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/2po1pxh.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/2095cvp.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/wmi91i.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/2dqrmed.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/deslxw.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/kbr63a.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/a5euzl.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/5meq88.png[/img]
[/center]
